lom:description.lom:string: "The Purdue Civil Engineering Graduate Program has over 250 students working toward either a Masterâ??s or PhD degree. The Masterâ??s degree program is designed to be flexible so that students can work with faculty members to develop a plan of study tailored to their professional goals. It also allows them to acquire the specialized skills that are increasingly necessary for professional practice (ASCE Policy Statement 465). The PhD degree provides an opportunity for more in-depth study necessary for students who want to pursue research and academic careers."
